lines.text: The odds against us are at least a hundred to one.
Those are the best odds I ever had.
Wow, this place is sure full of celebrities. I'm the only one in here I've never heard of.
Hey Big Spender, Spend a little time with me. Fun! Laughs! Good times! Fun! Laughs! Good times!
Without love, life would have no purpose.
There ain't no use flappin' your wings, 'cause we are stuck in the flypaper of life!
